sentences.en: After it had stopped snowing, we all went sledding.
sentences.cn: 雪停之后, 我们都去滑雪橇.

sentences.en: Analysts predicted rough sledding for handset makers.
sentences.cn: 分析人士预测手机市场处境艰难.

sentences.en: Do Mark and Kathleen go sledding with them?
sentences.cn: 马克和凯萨琳会和他们一起去滑雪 吗 ?

sentences.en: He does not always have smooth sledding in the field of politics.
sentences.cn: 他在政坛并非总是一帆风顺.

sentences.en: Luck has come our way at last , after all the hard sledding.
sentences.cn: 我们拼命苦干了多年,终于交上好运了.

sentences.en: The children took turns sledding down the hill.
sentences.cn: 孩子们轮流坐雪橇滑下山丘.

sentences.en: We got home and went sledding on the small hill in our back yard.
sentences.cn: 我们回到家里，然后去后院的小山上滑雪橇。

sentences.en: What other people see them and to go sledding?
sentences.cn: 哪些人看见他们,也想去滑雪 呢 ?

sentences.en: Winter in many places means ice skating, sledding and fights.
sentences.cn: 在许多地方冬天意味着溜冰, 雪橇和打雪仗.

sentences.en: Winter in many places means ice skating, sledding, and snowball fights.
sentences.cn: 在很多地方,冬季意味着滑冰 、 乘雪橇以及打雪仗.

sentences.en: Winter in many places means iceskating skating, sliding sledding and snowball fights.
sentences.cn: 在许多地方,冬天意味着滑冰 、 滑雪撬和打雪仗.

sentences.en: Winter in many places means skating, sledding and snowball fights.
sentences.cn: 在许多地方,冬天意味着溜冰, 滑雪和打雪仗.

sentences.en: You know how I love sledding, skiing and ice - skating!
sentences.cn: 你知道,我喜欢坐雪橇, 喜欢滑雪还喜欢溜冰.

words.tran_cn: 用雪橇搬运；乘雪橇；用大锤打
乘雪橇；用雪橇运（sled的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 雪橇犬；雪橇狗；拉雪橇的狗
